overview.heading: Chandler Virtual Office
overview.body: Unlock the benefits of a distinguished business address in Chandler without the high costs of maintaining a physical space. Opus VO allows you to position your company in one of two premium Chandler locations for a fraction of the price of a traditional office lease. Utilize our state-of-the-art conference rooms for pivotal meetings and client interactions, while elevating your company with a business address.  Choosing a virtual office in Chandler through Opus VO grants you the exclusive advantage of a live receptionist. Dedicated to delivering personalized, top-notch customer service, our team ensures that every client encounter aligns with your specific business objectives. Hand over routine administrative chores like digital mail management and advanced call-forwarding to us, enabling you to concentrate on growing your business.

faqs.question: Can I receive mail under my company name and personal name?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can receive mail under both once your account has been activated.

faqs.question: Do you use an automated phone service or a receptionist to answer?
faqs.answer: We offer a live, personalized receptionist to transfer your calls during business hours Monday to Friday. Calls made after hours will be met with a professional voicemail.

faqs.question: Can I have a virtual office in Chandler, Arizona even if I don’t reside there?
faqs.answer: Yes, and it is a fantastic way to expand your presence to new clients. It will build trust with residents by having your business in the heart of Chandler. You can also adapt to better meet your clients’ unique needs within Arizona.

faqs.question: What do you mean by “all-inclusive services”?
faqs.answer: Our Chandler virtual office offerings include all features listed at the same monthly cost, regardless of the location you choose. Please note that mail centers and some premium locations may not include all options. If you would like additional information, you can compare Opus to our competitors or contact us.

sections.title: Why Choose a Chandler Virtual Office?
sections.body: Chandler is more than just a suburban oasis in the Arizona desert; it’s a growing business landscape with ample opportunities in tech, healthcare, and retail sectors. Conveniently located near crucial business centers, our Chandler offices provide effortless access to essential industry connections and networking functions.  By opting for an Opus Virtual Office in Chandler, you’re not just cutting your operating expenses; you’re gaining an invaluable competitive edge. Elevate your business to unprecedented heights by leveraging our first-class virtual office services today.  Choose from one of our two Chandler locations @ 2705 S. Alma School Road, Chandler, AZ 85286 or @ 2925 East Riggs Road Chandler, AZ 85249
